thread.title: LeBron James Watches Football on a Freaking IMAX
thread.title_full: LeBron James Watches Football on a Freaking IMAX | Complex UK

author: Gavin Evans
title: LeBron James Watches Football on a Freaking IMAX
text:
LeBron James is rich. Rich people have nice things. That should pretty much tell you why he can afford to combine four big screens Jumbotrons together to watch football on. As you can see his daughter Zhuri is loving it and, when you have a picture this gargantuan, there's no point in yelling "Down in front!" for the same reason that there's no point in getting up from your couch to wipe a microbe of dust off your screen.
Could explain neck problems in the future though.
[via Instagram ]
